title: CHOCOLATE PEANUT BUTTER ESPRESSO SMOOTHIE PARFAIT
directions: Add all of the ingredients minus the granola to a blender and blend until smooth. Pour into a glass and top with desired amount of granola. Feel free to also add slices of banana and cacao nibs to the topping as well.
ingredients: 1 cup lowfat chocolate milk, 1/2 of it frozen into cubes
1 teaspoon instant espresso powder (or finely ground coffee)
Granola for topping the smoothie (I used peanut butter flavored granola)
